column3:
Tested ACK 9fea833 on fed23 with bitcoind.

Though, QT will crash (regardless of this PR).

> Though, QT will crash (regardless of this PR).

Can you explain that more detailed? Why is QT crashing?

Probably better to open a separate issue, if there isn't one already.

On Monday, September 28, 2015, Jonas Schnelli notifications@github.com
wrote:

> Though, QT will crash (regardless of this PR).
> 
> Can you explain that more detailed? Why is QT crashing?

Could not crash Fedora and OSX when set my local date +2 day and did 5min IBD on testnet.\n
Fedora 23 is alpha, so likely it's a local issue with modal dialogs on my box. Doesn't hold back this PR.\n
date and time are correct but still load core bitcoin network\nThanks for the loyalty of the cooperation\n

A GUI crash is a serious issue, however please open a new issue for that with more information: debug.log tail, any messages, traceback if possible. It cannot be related to the trivial message change here.\n
Can no longer reproduce the GUI crash...\n
